item.title: What Color Is Your Monad
item.description: There’s a lovely old blog post What Color is Your Function (WCIYF). If you haven’t read that, please do so instead of reading this one. Since you are here, you should understand the colored function problem described in that post. I’d like to explore how that problem generalized beyond async concerns and how it connects to the much bemoaned monad. You don’t really need to know what a monad is to start reading this post, but you should understand the colored function problem described in the linked post.
